title: Where did my border go? i had it 1 game ago
body:
I had the new boarder one game ago gold and i was gold last season and i was gold b4 pre season

NOW ITS GONE :( WHAT HAPPENED!

replies.body: Same i had it but now its gone
my gold account has border and sivir my plat has nothing and the border from last season gone, maybe in time it wil update
idk m8 lol im not you {{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}

I dont understand because i do one game and many customs checking new jungle and border.. Then i play some fallout4 come back to play again and its gone and RIP just blank.. :(

DW guys lets just dream for a tomorrow and just hope! HOPE IS ALL WE HAVE!
